detectors.description:
KIRIN.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#710-725) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#716)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#719)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#L719)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in KIRIN.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#691-694):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#692)
		- u.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#621)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#556)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#693)
		- RIN.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#700)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#556)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#693)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#644)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#693)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#643)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#693)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#699)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#646)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#693)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KIRIN.sol#647)
